name: firestore-explorer
description: Web based admin UI to explore cloud firestore

scripts.onetime_setup: cd explorer && yarn && cd ../firebase-proxy && mkdir -p data && yarn && cp -rf sample.db.json data/db.json
scripts.serve: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "webapp,frproxy" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "cd explorer && yarn serve" "cd firebase-proxy && yarn dev"
scripts.lint: cd explorer && yarn lint && cd ../firebase-proxy && yarn format

author: Madhusudhan Sambojhu <madhu@able.do> (https://github.com/madhu314)
